metadata.synopsis: Gale is interested in items woven with especially powerful magic. In these lines, you come across one such item. This one is the Staff of Crones taken from the Hag.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A hag's staff has to be brimming with magic. Take a look, Gale.

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: A hag's magic is nothing to be scoffed at. Yes, this will suit perfectly.
